message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $15,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget, but $15,000 is a bit too high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer again?
